page.title: 16SCOUTING IN CRUDWELL
page.content:
{The 1st Crudwell Brownie Pack}meets at the school hall{every Monday}between 6.15pm and 7.30pm.The girls have great fun.They go on a pack holiday each year.
{Every Tuesday}at 6.45pm{the 1st {Crudwell cubs}start their meeting in the village hall with a grand howl.The boys work hard for badges or go to the playing field.Cubs finishes at 8.15pm.
{The Crudwell Guides meet on Thursdays between 7pm and 8pm in the school hall.There are five patrols which are named after flowers.The camps are very popular.
{Scouts is on Mondays}between 7pm and 9pm in the village hall.The patrols are Foxes,Panthers and Eagles.They do lots of activities.
